InventoryID: Zurich Market, Bukowski, Sale Cat. 8 Dec. 1983, no. 135 (ill.)
Imagery Description: This lid was offered at the same sale as the lebes gamikos by the Painter of Wurzburg H 5739 (no. 2/382). It consists of three sections, two lekanides with a small lebes gamikos on top; the former are decorated with (a) female head, (b) bird, the lebes with female heads on both sides.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
